articles.title: Indiana hires Darian DeVries: Will replace Mike Woodson after one season as West Virginia's coach - CBS Sports
articles.description: DeVries just wrapped up his first season with West Virginia after a six-year run at Drake
articles.content: Darian DeVries will succeed Mike Woodson as Indiana's head coach, the school announced Tuesday. DeVries just wrapped up his only season at West Virginia and was also in the mix for the opening at Iow… [+3862 chars]
